spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 343 Versatility for 10 sec.

name_description.display_string: The War Within Season 1 Raid Finder

effects.display_string:
Set: Your abilities have a chance to start a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of Rampage by 2%, stacking up to 10 times.
Rampage has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!

(4) Set: When you gain a stack of Winning Streak! you have an even chance to either cause your next Bloodthirst to deal 15% increased damage and have 25% increased chance to critically strike or cause your next Raging Blow to deal 15% increased damage and generate 2 additional Rage.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to place a Spelunker's Candle on your head, granting 3,206 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

Moving within 3 yards of an ally places the Spelunker's Candle on both heads, sharing the effect for the remaining duration.

Use: Unleash your inner tempest to gain 8,552 Strength for 15 sec. Your next 3 abilities cause a lightning blast dealing 467,813 Nature damage to your primary target. Damage increased by 100% with each subsequent blast. (2 Min Cooldown)
